text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/a161cb5dddd6d374899e46fde834ce9ba5c80c0b|patch 8.2.0665: wrongly assuming Python executable is called "python">
patch 8.2.0665: wrongly assuming Python executable is called "python"

Problem:    Wrongly assuming Python executable is called "python".
Solution:   Use detected python command. (Ken Takata, closes #6016)
            Also use CheckFunction if possible.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0665: wrongly assuming Python executable is called "python" · vim/vim@a161cb5
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0665: wrongly assuming Python executable is called "python" · vim/vim@a161cb5
attachments.text: Problem: Wrongly assuming Python executable is called "python". Solution: Use detected python command. (Ken Takata, closes #6016) Also use CheckFunction if possible.

patch 8.2.0670: cannot change window when evaluating 'completefunc'

Problem:    Cannot change window when evaluating 'completefunc'.
Solution:   Make a difference between not changing text or buffers and also
            not changing window.

patch 8.2.0672: heredoc in scripts does not accept lower case marker

Problem:    Heredoc in scripts does not accept lower case marker.
Solution:   Allow lower case only in non-Vim scripts. (Ken Takata,
            closes #6019)

attachments.text: Problem: Heredoc in scripts does not accept lower case marker. Solution: Allow lower case only in non-Vim scripts. (Ken Takata, closes #6019)

patch 8.2.0676: pattern in list of distributed files does not match

Problem:    Pattern in list of distributed files does not match.
Solution:   Drop "testdir/test_[a-z]*.ok".  Add CI sed files.
